Flicker opens a comm link to the base when he gets
close enough.

Flicker:  HEY LOOK, YOU MAY OR MAY NOT REMEMBER ME,
BUT YOU HAVE SOMETHING I WANT, AND I MAY HAVE
SOMETHINGS YOU NEED!  I HAVE SUPPLIES THAT MAY HELP
REPAIRING YOUR SHIP, I ACTUALLY BROUGHT THEM FOR
MEGATRON, BUT I KNOW THAT PHOENIX IS IN THERE
SOMEWHERE, AND IF YOU TURN HER OVER I'M WILLING TO
TRADE!

It was desperate, considering what Phoenix was, but
maybe they had finally decided she'd never convert and
was next to worthless to them.

--- cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:
> OOC: And so the first bot finds where the Rogues
> hang out.  Don't 
> expect life to be easy; Rogue Star's defenses and
> sensors are fully 
> operational and a single transformer has no hope in
> hell of breaking 
> or sneaking through.
> 
> Torin/Phoenix::
> 
> Flat-out bored, Torin watches the screens.  Without
> replacement 
> parts, the engines cannot be brought online.  The
> jack-of-all-trades 
> bot feels a wave of frustration, knowing that Rogue
> Star has lost its 
> most crucial advantage - maneuverability - while
> leaving most of its 
> other systems functional like a taunt.
> 
> Then the scanners pick up a lone Predacon, making a
> beeline for the 
> downed ship.  Torin blinks.  How could they have
> penetrated the 
> Rogues' cloaking technology so easily?  Concerned,
> he monitors the 
> interloper's approach, sending a coded alert to
> Gatara.
> 
> -----
> 
> Phoenix collapses to the floor in despair at her
> sitiuation.  If only 
> she could get the door open!  But all her efforts
> are in vain; 
> nothing she can think of would budge the portal
> other than firing her 
> incendiary rockets at it - and she lacks ammunition
> for her weapons.
> 
> Burying her head in her arms, the prisoner cries
> herself to sleep.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Flicker continued looking at the monitor.  He
> wished the Maximals 
> > would clear out so he could talk to Megatron, but
> then a nearby 
> > device started beeping haywire and he picked it
> up.
> > 
> > Flicker:  Huh....is this thing busted that would
> mean there's a 
> > m......(looses his breath) OH MATRIX!  IT'S HER!
> > 
> > He runs to a stasis pod and takes a firefly Beast
> Mode.  Then he 
> > opens the door and activates a fairly weak energy
> shield and sets 
> off 
> > towards the Rouges base.
> 
>
